data.short_description: The soundtrack for Fallout: New Vegas
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Italian, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS: Windows 7/Vista/XP
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 2GB RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 10GB free space
  • Video Card: NVIDIA GeForce 6 series, ATI 1300XT series
